thread.section_title: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance | calcas.com
thread.title: Randy
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Randy

author: Randy
title: Randy
text:
California Casualty has some of the lowest rates around. Luckily I have not had any incidents where I needed to use the insurance, either auto or renters, but I can't imagine them being bad.
They are always very helpful over the phone and quick to respond. I've asked them to mail out additional information a few times, and they have always mailed me things that day for no cost.
I wish they had a nice usable website like many of the big name insurance companies do. But they are very receptive when you call in, which most big name insurance companies are not.
